Session.DISCONNECT: The server connection has been lost, please wait until reconnection...
Session.REFUSED: Your connection have been refused by the server, you have been disconnected...

Login.LOGIN_ERROR: Wrong credentials or service unavailable, please try again

Register.WEAK_PASSWORD_MIN: Your password must be at least 8 characters long
Register.WEAK_PASSWORD_MAX: Your password must have a maximum length of 128 characters
Register.WEAK_PASSWORD_LOWERCASE: Your password must contain at least one lowercase letter
Register.WEAK_PASSWORD_UPPERCASE: Your password must contain at least one capital letter
Register.WEAK_PASSWORD_DIGITS: Your password must contain at least one digit
Register.WEAK_PASSWORD_SYMBOLS: Your password must contain at least one special character such as :;?!+-.,^@
Register.WEAK_PASSWORD_ONEOF: Your password is recognized as one of the most common passwords
Register.REGISTER_ERROR: Wrong input or service unavailable, please try again

ForgotPassword.TITLE: Reset my password ?
ForgotPassword.MESSAGE: Enter your email address and we will send you a code to reset your password
ForgotPassword.ERROR_MESSAGE_DEFAULT: Error while sending email, please check the address and send it again or try again later

ResetPassword.TITLE: Reset your password ?
ResetPassword.MESSAGE: Please enter your new password to proceed
ResetPassword.TOKEN_FIELD_LABEL: Enter the code received by email
ResetPassword.MISSING_TOKEN: Code received by email is required
ResetPassword.ERROR_TOKEN_LENGTH: Code received by email must contain 6 digits
ResetPassword.SUCCESS_MESSAGE: Password reset, you will receive a confirmation email
ResetPassword.ERROR_MESSAGE: Error while trying to reset password, please try again

DeleteAccountManager.TITLE: Delete my account
DeleteAccountManager.QUESTION: Are you sure you want to delete your account ?
DeleteAccountManager.CONFIRMATION_TITLE: Warning: the deletion of your account is irrevocable and all data attached to it will be lost
DeleteAccountManager.CONFIRMATION: Enter your account email to confirm the deletion
DeleteAccountManager.ERROR_MESSAGE: Unable to delete your account, please try again

VerifyEmailManager.TITLE: Check my email address
VerifyEmailManager.HELP_LABEL: Why should I verify my email address ?
VerifyEmailManager.HELP_TEXT: Verifying your email address improves the security of your account. Once you have verified your email address, both your password and access to your email account are required in order to make any changes to your account credentials, such as your password and contact email address. This helps further protect your account from being stolen by a potential phisher.
VerifyEmailManager.HELP_EMAIL_LABEL: I never received the verification email, what should I do ?
VerifyEmailManager.HELP_EMAIL_TEXT: If you do not receive your signup verification email and you are running a Spam filter, check and make sure the message has not been filtered as spam. Please try adding {email} to your contacts or trusted senders list within your email client and attempt to re-verify your email address. You can also click the button below and we'll send you the email again.
VerifyEmailManager.TOKEN_LABEL: Enter the code received by email to validate your email address
VerifyEmailManager.EMAIL_VERIFIED: Your address has been verified. An email has been sent to you to confirm the change.
VerifyEmailManager.ERROR_MESSAGE: Invalid code, request a new one
VerifyEmailManager.RESEND_TOKEN_SUCCESS: A new verification code has been sent to you
VerifyEmailManager.RESEND_TOKEN_ERROR: We were unable to send you a new verification code. If the problem persists, please contact us.

PasswordManager.TITLE: Change my password
PasswordManager.PASSWORD_CHANGED: Your password has been successfully changed
PasswordManager.MISSING_PASSWORD_CONFIRMATION: Confirmation of your new password is required
PasswordManager.PASSWORD_CONFIRMATION_NOT_MATCH: Confirmation of new password must match new password
PasswordManager.PASSWORD_ERROR_MESSAGE: The data you provided did not allow us to change your password

EmailManager.TITLE: Change my email address
EmailManager.TOKEN_LABEL: To validate your new email address, enter the code you received by email
EmailManager.EMAIL_CHANGED: You new address has been taken into account. An email has been sent to you to confirm the change.
EmailManager.EMAIL_VALIDITY: Your new email address is invalid
